post.body: finally made it back to old town only took 7 hours from Pittsburgh. Should have known holidy traffic Hope you guys made it safe
probably is US only unfortunately. Last.fm is a good alternative, unless that is US only too.
agree. I love pandora's iPhone app. Just wish it would run in the background like iTunes. Hopefully in the next update or two.
pretty please can I receive an invite? I promise to do a full review of how it works on my appletv on http://www.constantskeptic.com
true... I use Pandora and Last.fm like crazy.... also I got the 16GB iphone 3g so I have a giant array of songs to choose from...
re-tweeting your link, just watched the president elect's weekly address on youtube. here is the link again http://tinyurl.com/6onnbx
"falling slowly" and "all the way down" the two best ones of course :)
Love the Once soundtrack as well. Glen Hansard is amazingly emotional on guitar. Makes me jealous. Learned a few of his songs
Very good nuggets of truth amid crazy ramblings, just the way I like it. On page 216 and counting. Has a HST or Kerouac quality.
One pointer I can give to drive traffic is to make sure your site is up. constantskeptic.com has been down due to easycgi servers
awesome, thanks for the link, that is one mystery off the list.Retweet of the link - http://tinyurl.com/633quj antikythera explained
lets see, clarification about my cat stevens msg.. I am just really upset that he never plays any of his pre-namechange songs
The light horse next to murphys on king st has reggae night upstr every Wed. sorry didn't reply last night. they have music thurs 2
Does sitting still in traffic count? :)
5.40 for my triple expresso truffle this morning from starbxks. caribou coffee is so much better. wish I had one close.
Thank God futuretweets is finally working correctly in the EST time zone and not halfway around the world.
Totally agree firefox for power use and chrome for quick and dirty browsing.
Did you try the ietab addon for firefox to switch to ie rendering on the fly to view sites tand web services that require IE?
At the light horse listening to reggae on king street. http://piurl.com/rru : current location
Dishes done, dinner eaten, now on to laundry then hopefully some guitar and reading. Only have about thirty books to finish.
my Twitterank is 65.58! http://twitterank.com/view/Jamescampbell
May no sound disturb the slumbers of the kraken! - e. a. Poe from ms in a bottle.
quote "The essential difference between emotion and reason is that emotion leads to action while reason leads to conclusions." kevin roberts
Listening to all radiohead in turnpike traffic eastbound towards breezewood.
http://piurl.com/p__ : current location valley hotel aka hells roadhouse in dravosburg pa. Waiting for open mike night to begin.♬
Not going shopping tomorrow. Don't people realize how crazy it will be? Buy your stuff online! There is already a line of people at bestbuy.
Happy thanksgiving to all my tweeps! ☺✌
Packing to head to Pittsburgh for thanksgiving. Apparently it is going to be snow snow snow. Good good good.
Best fortune cookie I ever got: "Don't worry about the world ending, it is already tomorrow in Austrailia."
Ok, I use last.fm to share my music tastes and scrobble my iTunes. I am using pandora to discover new music on my iPhone. Any thoughts?
http://twitpic.com/nwlq - d boxee thx! Installing it now after I finally configured USB correctly.
contemplating how close I came to buying new tires this morning instead of just getting my leaky front right tire fixed... mr.tire is sneaky
Question: Is there going to be an iphone app for xm / sirius radio? I have both and I was just wondering...
Very angry with easycgi right now. Apparently my site constantskeptic.com is going to be down for an indefinite amount of time. Time for bed
http://twitpic.com/qrq8 - Time to change the guitar strings on my acoustic martin finally.... It's only been six months ;)
Awesome first snow for me in old town!
Sorry meant band practice not ban. ✔
Grabbing some delicious red Mei to go on king st and then heading to ban practice. A little sick but hopefully spicy pad tai clears me up. ☻

I am now a registered iPhone app developer. The only catch is I don't have the requird apple OS. Going to *try* to create partition dualboot
Almost got stuck in old town. Car parked behind police barricade for the Scottish walk parade. Luckily they let me uturn it and sneak out.
http://piurl.com/sgg : current location rock n roll hotel DC playing pool.
At the turkey dinner I never had.

I just confirmed with Santa, all the bad boys and girls of twitterland who don't follow others back will get virtual coal in their inboxes.
Santa is outside at the fire station with donuts and pictures for families here in old town. Feels like Christmas time. http://piurl.com/t8l
http://twitpic.com/qyxr - Reading about ancient mysteries. There is a lot that science has yet to explain. Like the antikythera device. ☼
Eating vanilla swiss almond ice cream and reading about the end of the world while it rains in old town. All in all, a glorious night.
http://twitpic.com/rk6e - just got a new doomsday book, 2012 The Return of Quetzalcoatl. Too apocalyptic to pass up. Usually buy on amazon.
perfect temperature in old town tonight for walking
just found out that slash used to race bmx like I did. random 6 degrees of kevin baconesque fact for the day.
just got done jamming by myself. jeff buckey, weezer, and the pixies covers before I worked up an appetite. on to pat troys for wifi / food.
man today turned into a busy day, where did the past three hours go?
fruitful morning at work, heading to get Thai for lunch.
triple expresso truffle, bottle water, banana bread and listening to iphone, the black keys on pandora, not to bad of a work morning so far
http://www.hulu.com really is the future of television. Fringe, The Office, House, Simpsons, Family Guy, Heroes, and movies too, chek it out
trying to figure out why I bought apple tv when I have a wired hdmi connection from my laptop whenever I want. guess I hoped for more.
I wonder if glade plugins cause cancer... seems like everything causes cancer... life should come with a warning label.
limiting my thoughts to 140 characters sometimes does make me sound retarded i guess @dariyn
calling att about my overages this month... 480 minutes over? jeez I guess either I am getting popular or more chatty.. retro-upgrade please
finally did the dishes, I miss having a dishwasher but it was actually relaxing to do them by hand... seems like they were all mugs anyway
I hate how my iPhone screen gets so smudgy. Are my fingers really that greasy?
people drive like such idiots in the rain.
probably my last day wearing shorts before spring so going out in old town in style. blue and white plaids on my way to reggae night.
at chadwicks in old town getting a po'boy catfish sandwich dinner. http://piurl.com/uHW : current location great place to hang out.
heading home on a raingloom day happy to have it over with. telecaster is calling.
Blagojevich looks like Stephen King and Joe Montana hybrid. very strange
lady locks white mocha and dan in real life under blankets for lunch. glorious
I can't believe some people still have not seen Superbad. Please add to your new years resolutions. Top 25 funniest movies of all time.
http://www.omgili.com/ very cool topic search engine
starving waiting for lunch to arrive, guess I should have eaten breakfast
getting ready for my roadtrip to snowboard at seven springs all weekend. stopping by pittsburgh tonight to visit the relatives and friends.
http://tinyurl.com/ch9q9 @dariyn Wikipedia is not managed by a single group but edited and updated by everyone. hivemind
Watching the fountain in bluray while the rain pours down outside. probably will pass out on my leather couch, long freaking day.

watching "wanted" but not really wanting to, a friend gave it to me to borrow it so I might as well give it a go.
